Package jenga

Jenga is an game of skill : the player must take blocks out of a tower without making it fall down.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ActionJenga There are at most three different moves : Taking the central block of a full level (MOVECENTER) Taking a lateral block of a full level (MOVESIDE) Taking a lateral block from a level with only two adjacents blocks (LEAVEONE)
JengaTower Jenga is an game of skill : the player must take blocks out of a tower without making it fall down.
StateJenga Following the analysis of this paper, a state can be coded with three integers.
 

Package jenga Description

Jenga is an game of skill : the player must take blocks out of a tower without making it fall down. But assuming that his skill is perfect, it turns out to be a Nim-like game, with a winning strategy for one of the players (depending of the highness of the tower).
This paper analyses the game, and describe the strategy.
The interest of the game in the perspective of Reinforcement Learning, is to see whether the algorithms found this strategy, and whether it is understandable (and quickly found !).
